subject: Order #SSN1677
description_text:
I ordered these on the 6th of June and have not received a tracking number. Can you give me the status of this order?

Thank you,

Britt

conversations.body_text: Hi Britt Tucker,  We will immediately check whether your order has been shipped and confirm if the tracking number was accidentally omitted. We’ll get back to you shortly.

Thank you!

Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Britt Tucker,    We have just confirmed that the Pro X Ultra you purchased is currently out of stock at our US warehouse.  We expect new stock to arrive soon, so we are in no rush to ship the baseplate from China for you, and we will arrange to ship the baseplate to you as soon as we receive it in our warehouse.  Thank you for your understanding and patience. Sorry for the delay!

Can you give me an update on my order?

Order #SSN1677

Thank you,

Britt


________________________________
